Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 149th overall pick, by Arizona in 2014...
Injured on 3/11/2014 with a Pulled Bicep Tendon, out for 2 weeks...
Injured on 5/19/2014 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Arizona to Philadelphia on 2/6/2015 (Going to PHI: P Braden Shipley, P Bradley Zeman, LF Gerardo Parra. Going to ARI: LF Ryan Braun, 2B Ivan DeJesus, C Chun-Hsiu Chen)...
Injured on 7/21/2015 with a Inflamed Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 3/21/2016 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/8/2016, off Cory Mazzoni (NYM)...
Earned first career win on 4/14/2016...
Injured on 6/11/2016 with a Tight Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/20/2017 with a Inflamed Tricep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 6/25/2017 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/2018, going 7-0, 1.06...
2/2/2019: Gets a new one-year contract worth $735,714 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2020: Gets a new one-year contract worth $735,714 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,421,429 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 6/23/2021 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 8 weeks...
10/3/2021: Signed a contract extension with Philadelphia, $20,000,000 per year, for 5 years.
Traded from Philadelphia to Washington on 2/1/2023 (Going to WAS: P Bradley Zeman, P James Gilley, 3B Fernando Perez. Going to PHI: SS Andrew Sohn, P Manny Ibarra, P Marcelino Hermosillo)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/2024, going 6-0, 1.21...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 2/1/2027 to a 4-year deal worth $7,000,000 per year...
